bow: how do you get your self care time in the morning ve been running into dilemma recently mommas my daughter is 18 months and she is into everything which is really affecting my ability to do the basic self care in the morning like washing my face brushing my teeth god forbid showering or blow drying my hair the last time took shower with her locked in the bathroom with me she ignored the box of toys we keep in the bathroom and instead broke into the drawer where keep my tampons there was drawer lock on it but apparently she has super toddler strength and threw tampons all over the bathroom before screaming at me and banging on the glass shower door now mommas try to be zen about it and use soft voice to say almost done and ll be just minute and sing songs and recite books but all am tired and just want to shower so here is my question what works worked for you at this age did you get up early before your kid did you only shower when your so could watch them this is harder for me since my so travels lot and is often on last minute conference calls did you toddler proof the bathroom and just let them scream ve honestly thought about buying second set of all of my toiletries to have downstairs so can use them in the kitchen while she eats breakfast just so tired of this and would so appreciate some new strategies to try sure lot of them are obvious but mom stupid after the holidays my kids play in the tub while shower get their toys out and just let them go to town while wash up my yo isn fan but my yo loves it that good idea hadn thought of tried this when she was maybe 12 months but maybe now she will be more into it what toys do you have that keep their attention in the shower wonder if her plastic cups and such would keep her attention duh good idea thank you did this too and when sat at my makeup desk had drawer that was hers that had clean brushes and things of mine that she could do her makeup with while got ready get up at 5am so that can shower and have cup of coffee by myself single mom so do have second pair of eyes to help me if ca get up before my kid for whatever reason just take the little one into the shower with me it basically splash pad for them there have been times when ve deployed the pack and play and let my kiddo play in there while cleaned up have year old who is also the into everything type yay and ve learned that have to get up before him thankfully we ve managed to get him usually sleeping till if get up between and 6:15 it gives me enough time to shower dress put on makeup and usually do my hair do utilize dry shampoo lot typically only wash my hair two or three times during the work week also if know going to have busy or rushed morning ll wash and dry my hair the night before worst case scenario he wakes up super early my husband will go sit in the recliner in his bedroom with him but try to avoid this by being ready by 6:40 or so few times my hubs hasn been able to help out and ve had to bring little man into the shower with me thankfully he loves it but this scenario kind of throws off our whole usual routine for the day take my shower at night after put my kids to bed do my hair and makeup in the morning either before they are both up or while they have breakfast we have foam animals that stick to the walls that she loves and honestly just the bubbles from my shampoo and body wash entertain her she scoops them and washes the walls with them my son is almost so this may not work at 18 months but sometimes sit him in the bathroom with his tablet it will usually entertain him for the time it takes me to shower shaving cream smeared on the walls would always keep my lil dude busy for long time bonus is it kinda cleans the walls switch off with my husband in the morning and one of us gets up super early before the kids are up and showers while the other one gets up little later to start the breakfast routine used to do this too just take our kid in the shower with me she loves it do what need to get done she ends up clean too my daughter showers with me when dad is around to watch her she loves to play in the tub and does pretty good job entertaining herself while wash my hair sometimes can even shave while she in there we also gate off an area upstairs so she can run around from room to room while get ready she still needs some light supervision but the rooms available to her are mostly baby proofed shower at night when she asleep or before she gets up in the morning there no way she will sit there while shower and get ready if she gets up early sometimes ll have her watch tv for 15 min while brush my teeth and get dressed but try to be ready before she wakes up my daughter is 18 months put her in the pack and play right outside the bathroom door and leave the door open our bathroom is super tiny so it like feet from the shower if you have big bathroom you could put it in the bathroom give her done toys sometimes she screams but she safe and contained so just take quick shower we used the exersaucer looooooooooooooooot longer than recommended yep same 5am sucks but it worth it for that time my daughter is also 18 months and we do the same thing pack and play outside the bathroom have huge master bath so could probably put the pack and play in the bathroom but my daughter fussed more when she can see me so right outside the bathroom with the wiggles on tv works better for us my daughter watches tv and trashes the lounge room while shower she helps me brush my hair and climbs up in stool and we brish our teeth together she hates the shower but loves baths she has bath every night and sometimes join her in the tub so even if dont shower the next morning cleanish dry shampoo is your friend when she was really little too little yo watxh tv by herself and was back at work go to the gym and put her in the childcare do half arsed work out or no work out and take nice long shower and do all my self care then collect her from the childcare and go about pur day worth the cost of gym membership this is the only way am clean and or presentable on daily basis baby proofed my house and used baby gates to block stairs kitchen etc never had an issue of showering or doing what wanted since my daughter could watch herself for at least the time it took for quick shower she didn need my eyes on her 24 have kickstand on my phone case stick him in his crib and put on sarah and duck had the video monitor to make sure he was going nuts kid does like tv so shower at night or when my so is still home in the am think this is going to have to happen not just for the time to get physically ready but also to get mentally ready for being at home with her all day want this to be our routine but my husband travels so much and so erratically that don feel like we could get it to be true routine during the week but maybe that something could institute on the weekend she has previously hated being confined in the pnp but always had her in the bathroom with me maybe need to try her just outside the door like you said with tablet of elmo world on and some toys this is stroke of genius mommas love this we don have one but ll keep it in mind if we ever have second but before that like to nail down regular hygiene hahaha have honestly thought about this belonged to the ymca in our city for bit but fell off because none of the fitness classes worked with her nap schedule at the time might time to renew shower every other day would totally be worth 75 month this is super popular answer and definitely going to try it would love love love it if she liked the shower because currently she not super thrilled about baths like she used to be what is sarah and duck we watch lot of elmo but haven heard of this think we might have to try crib and or pnp again previously would have her in the pnp in the bathroom with me but she always fussed maybe being alone would be better usually shower at night after he goes to bed but if need to shower or spend longer getting ready put him in his room and put gate up he usually just reads or plays nicely he yet to pull all of his clothes out of drawers someone else commented that they would just shower with their kid used to do that too and it worked really well my son would just sit and play while showered wish our house was more baby proofed but our mater bedroom bed is like paralyzation station for her platform bed with fluffy blankets that seems impossible to baby proof at the moment and she constantly falls off of definitely want to try getting her in the shower with me though it been couple of months since we tried that thank you for the help definitely going to try that we tried it few months ago and she hated it but maybe few months will help thank you for the help removed also love your name think am coming to terms with the 5am wake up like you said it would be worth it haha my guy likes having couple cups and bowls and my old peri bottle fill the peri bottle with bath temp water and he sprays it around and fills the cups and transfers water all around either shower at night after bedtime or in the morning before he gets up for at least the last year ve made an effort to get up and have some time to myself in the morning this does mean getting up early but my husband wakes up early to go to the gym and or work so it has affected our sleep schedule too much to me the sleep miss in the morning is worth the sanity gain from not having to deal with balancing him and myself in the morning such good toy ideas have all those things thanks for the idea momma if give my son cups or bowls in the bath he drinks the bath water that he probably just peed in my 19 month old still takes two naps day first one around 10 so we just wake up do our whole breakfast business give her bath and we play and she goes down for nap and shower don think this is typical though when she refuses to sleep just put her in her crib or pack play my shower is 10 minutes tops and she usually fine for that time will shower right now when my one year old takes her morning nap put the year old in front of nintendo otherwise meh won shower for couple days and just let her rip the toilet paper all over the bathroom while brush my teeth thanks omg love the childcare at the my son loves it too he cries when we leave lol go on the treadmill and watch tv shows that enjoy it just great that mentally ready post made huge difference for me when had to do the same there something about greeting your kid when you re already dressed and you feel like person daniel tiger babysits for me but seriously our house is childproofed and she likes her special tv time sit her on the floor with plenty of toys and bowl of cheerios and hop in the shower can get at least 10 15 minutes before she toddles in to talk to me and then she watches me while get ready or gets bored and goes to find toy either way works for me ve been known to drag the high chair into the bathroom and let him eat breakfast while shower in the morning did this too it british show on netflix super cute and almost soothing that or ve watched it too much youtube on my phone if do get out of bed before he does or chuck some toys for him in the cot and have shower do makeup and enjoy coffee at work in peace so has almost every kid ever it like right of passage wouldn worry about it removed this may work better than having her too close my daughter will only play by herself if am not in the room also in the pnp have sippy cup toys books blankeys stuffies and rotate it out and have music playing for her too maybe she getting bored and wants to switch it up also do kids bath while shower the coolest bath toy we have is set of pipes that suction to the side of the bath or shower boon pipes think along with some cups for pouring they also really like using peri bottles and regular spray bottle mostly my husband takes over when shower if know we ll have stressful morning take bath the night before shower while my husband hangs out with my son then he watches youtube while fix my hair totally understandable because am that way with elmo world 🤷‍♀️ when mine was 18 months just showered when she was asleep or when hubby was off work once she turned she got more into tv so just give her cup of water and put the tv on and take shower and get ready for my day it the only time allow her tv during the day so she is usually glued to it works great so hopefully you don have much longer to go until you can do the above take my 19 month old in the shower with me then she does her skincare and makeup routine while do mine give her empty jars and brushes to play with we keep all her stuff in the bottom drawer of my vanity so she can get stuff out on her own when she does feel like playing along take out box of toys she rarely plays with that keep in my room if that does work netflix on the ipad dry her hair while dry mine by switching the hair dryer to the lowest and coolest setting and kind of swish the hair dryer so it blows her hair around then we go get her clothes and get dressed together luckily she in the wanting to do everything mommy does phase have no idea how ll manage when baby is born love sarah and duck my daughter does watch it anyway it so soothing ca believe never thought of that brilliant agreed 5am is brutal but it the only time can get in workout shower blog reading quiet me time kind of morning when 5am does work mickey mouse clubhouse or sesame street on the ipad keeps my 17 month old out of trouble long enough for quick shower try not to give him screen as much as possible but sometimes it really sanity saver you re not alone there are days find sarah and duck to be borderline enjoyable same but there no stopping it anyway late but wake up early wake up around and go to the gym so come home before she wakes up at my 16 mo hangs out in the pack play in the doorway of the bathroom while shower she entertains herself with the 1000 toys throw in there with her get 10 min shower in usually been doing this since months or so so she might just have accepted this as our routine cry for the day
